data.title: Weather Report
data.desc: This project is the result of practicing API requests by creating a simple Weather Report web using JavaScript. Requesting the API to weather.visual crossing. With a simple interface, I managed to create this weather report even though its accuracy level is not very high.

data.title: Irzi | First Portfolio
data.desc: My first portfolio website created only using Tailwind CSS and Vanilla JavaScript.

data.title: Todo List RESTful API
data.desc: This project is the culmination of my learning journey in building a RESTful API for effective task management and organization. API for managing and organizing your tasks effectively, like Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) a personal task management or integrating task functionality into your project.

data.title: Todo List Web App With Next.js
data.desc: Practicing create a Todo List Web App with React and Next.js.

data.title: MovieList With NextJS
data.desc: This is a simple web application built with Next.js that displays a list of movies and TV series.
